sentences.en: A trivial misunderstanding caused a breach between them.
sentences.cn: 小小的误会引起了他们之间的不和.

sentences.en: At first, the incident seemed to be trivial.
sentences.cn: 起初, 这一事件似乎并不重要.平常的,普通的

sentences.en: Be patient. Don't lose your temper over trivial matters.
sentences.cn: 忍着点, 别为了一点小事发火.

sentences.en: Don't get impatient about trivial thing like that.
He often dissipated his energies in trivial matters.
sentences.cn: 他常在无关紧要的小事上浪费精力.

sentences.en: Her feelings for Simon seemed trivial by comparison .
sentences.cn: 相比之下，她对西蒙的感情就显得微不足道了。

sentences.en: His mood can be gauged by his reaction to the most trivial of incidents.
sentences.cn: 从他对鸡毛蒜皮的小事的反应就可以判断出他的情绪。

sentences.en: I had been lulled into thinking the publicity would be a trivial matter.
sentences.cn: 我错误地相信了媒体的报道只是小事一桩。

sentences.en: I know it sounds trivial , but I'm worried about it.
sentences.cn: 我知道这事听起来微不足道，但我还是放心不下。

sentences.en: It's useless to fire away with such trivial details.
sentences.cn: 喋喋不休地谈这些琐碎细节是无用的.

sentences.en: She works herself up about the most trivial things.
sentences.cn: 她为了最琐碎的事也会使自己激动起来.

sentences.en: The director tried to wave aside these issues as trivial details that could be settled later.
sentences.cn: 主管试图对这些问题置之不理，认为都是些细枝末节的小事，可以稍后解决。

sentences.en: There are a few trivial slips in this lesson.
sentences.cn: 在这篇课文中有几个小错误.

sentences.en: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!
sentences.cn: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

sentences.en: Trivial formalities have been done away with.
We haven't had time. We've been too busy with trivial matters!
sentences.cn: 我们尽忙着鸡毛蒜皮的事,还没顾上呢!

words.tran_cn: 琐细的;不重要的;浅薄的

phrases.tran_cn: 无关重要的事情（trivial matter的复数形式）
打破砂锅问到底(一种问答游戏)

trans.tran_cn: 琐碎的，无价值的，平常的，平凡的，不重要的，[生]种的
